Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 44th overall pick, by Houston in 1982...
Traded from Houston to Atlanta on 2/20/1982 (Going to HOU: P M. Williamson. Going to ATL: P R. McDowell)...
Earned first career win on 4/4/1987...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/2/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $6,900,000 per year...
